中文品名: 腦寧安 腦膜炎雙球菌四價接合型疫苗
英文品名: Menveo Meningococcal Group A, C, W-135 and Y conjugate vaccine
適應症: Menveo 可用於幼童(2 歲及以上)、青少年與成人(≦55 歲)的主動免疫接種，以預防腦膜炎雙球菌(Neisseria meningitidis)血清型A、C、W-135與Y 所引起的侵入性疾病。
劑型: 24B注射用凍晶粉末與注射用液劑
包裝: 玻璃小瓶裝 含粉末的小瓶及含液體的小瓶 100支以下盒裝
主成分略述: Meningococcal group A oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein, Meningococcal group C oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein, Meningococcal group W-135 oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein, Meningococcal group Y oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein

主製造廠.申請商名稱: 6201011338  荷商葛蘭素史克藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司
主製造廠.申請商地址: 臺北市中正區忠孝西路一段66號23、24樓

CCC號列: 30022000008 人類醫藥用疫苗Vaccines for human medicine

次製造廠.製造廠廠址: 桃園市大園區和平里1鄰開和路91號

次製造廠.製程: 調液、充填和凍晶乾燥作業

ingredients.成分名稱: Meningococcal group A oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein
ingredients.含量描述: Meningococcal group A oligosaccharide......10 micrograms Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein......16.7 to 33.3 micrograms

ingredients.成分名稱: Meningococcal group C oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein
ingredients.含量描述: Meningococcal group C oligosaccharide......5 micrograms Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein......7.1 to 12.5 micrograms

ingredients.成分名稱: Meningococcal group W-135 oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein
ingredients.含量描述: Meningococcal group W-135 oligosaccharide......5 micrograms Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein......3.3 to 8.3 micrograms

ingredients.成分名稱: Meningococcal group Y oligosaccharide Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein
ingredients.含量描述: Meningococcal group Y oligosaccharide......5 micrograms Conjugated to Corynebacterium diphtheriae CRM197 protein......5.6 to 10.0 micrograms
